original_text:
**INSTITUTION
CARDIOTHORACIC SURGERY
DISCHARGE SUMMARY
PATIENT NAME :
**NAME[AAA , BBB M]
ACCOUNT # :
**ID-NUM
**ROOM
ATTENDING PHYSICIAN :
**NAME[YYY M ZZZ]
ADMISSION DATE :
**DATE[Dec 21 2007]
DISCHARGE DATE :
**DATE[Dec 24 2007]
ADMITTING DIAGNOSIS( ES ) :
Dislodged tracheostomy .
DISCHARGE DIAGNOSIS( ES ) :
Status post placement of new tracheostomy and status post bronchoscopy .
PROCEDURES PERFORMED :
On **DATE[Dec 22 2007] , the patient underwent a flexible bronchoscopy and insertion of tracheostomy tube .
SUMMARY :
This patient is a **AGE[in 70s]- year-old female who presented to the emergency room on **DATE[Dec 21 2007] , with a dislodged tracheostomy tube .
It was decided by Dr. **NAME[ZZZ] that the patient go to the OR for bronchoscopy and evaluation of her airways and also for reinsertion of her tracheostomy .
The patient underwent the above named procedures and tolerated theses procedures very well .
While the patient was in the hospital , she was worked up by vascular surgery for her gangrenous right foot .
__________ have been done and MRI done today , on **DATE[Dec 24 2007] , is without any evidence of osteomyelitis .
The patient will be discharged home in stable condition .
She was encouraged to follow up with her primary care physician whom she sees for her right foot .
DISCHARGE INSTRUCTIONS :
Her discharge instructions are as follows :
1. Diet :
She has no restrictions .
She may resume a regular diet .
2. Activity :
She has no restrictions .
SPECIAL INSTRUCTIONS :
She is to call our office at **PHONE if she has increased shortness of breath , increased mucus production , fevers greater than 101 degrees Fahrenheit , or difficulty swallowing .
If these symptoms are severe , she was encouraged to go to emergency room immediately .
MEDICATIONS :
The patient was encouraged to resume all of her previous prescribed medications .
She was also prescribed Augmentin 875 mg p.o. b.i.d. x10 days for which a prescription was given to the patient .
___________________________________
**NAME[YYY M ZZZ]
Dictator :
**NAME[VVV XXX , WWW-M]
**INITIALS
D :
